mapper.insert: insert into MBR ( MBR_ID, MBR_NAME, MBR_PHONE_NO, MBR_PHOTO_URL, MBR_GENDER, MBR_REG_DATE) values (#{mbrId}, #{mbrName}, #{mbrPhoneNo}, #{mbrPhotoUrl}, #{mbrGender}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.mbr_id as mbrId , a.mbr_name as mbrName , a.mbr_phone_no as mbrPhoneNo , a.mbr_photo_url as mbrPhotoUrl , a.mbr_gender as mbrGender , a.mbr_reg_date as mbrRegDate , b.start_range as startRange , b.end_range as endRange FROM MBR a, SETTING b WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mbr_id = b.mbr_id AND a.mbr_id = #{value}
